A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This Star Wars was a complete departure from the series thus far and it was fantastic. I was extremely worried in the opening credits\, when the infamous yellow letters scrolled up from the bottom of screen I read what sounded like a copy of \"The Empire Strikes Back\" and I was so disappointed. Then the movie unfolded and had me hooked. The complexities within the movie were deep and really shook the foundations of how I saw Star Wars. I really don't understand the criticism of this movie\, I thought it did everything right. I went in with high expectations that were blown out of the water. Everything I expected to happen was turned on its head in a great way. This is one of the best Star Wars movies of all time.
